"It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011. Both on-premises and cloud-based versions of the platform will be available in 40 markets and 41 languages starting Feb. 28. A Jan. 17 statement by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer emphasized Dynamics CRM's familiar user experience, enabling greater collaboration, streamlining of processes and access to real-time data. Microsoft finds itself locked in fierce battle for CRM market-share with Salesforce.com and Oracle, both of which have shown little hesitation in both updating their products and sniping at their rivals. Mike Pence said he made the final decision not to run for president Wednesday night. He and his wife told their two daughters and then called their son, who is in college, early Thursday. We just concluded that while we could seek the presidency, we concluded that our best opportunity to continue to serve the people of Indiana was either in Washington, D.C., or here at home, Mike Pence said. Thursday afternoon, Mike Pence sent a letter to supporters and told politicians, such as Sens. Dick Lugar and Dan Coats , of his decision. Though Mike Pence said staying in

sphere as he makes his decision. "I just believe there's wisdom in multiple counselors and at the end of the day, this moment is not about me," he said. It's really about the people of Indiana. We're going to take an attitude of humility and a servant's attitude into our discussions with Hoosiers, and we'll see where they think we can best serve in the years ahead. Former Republican state Rep. Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rep.
